name: Tribeca Aesthetics
description: Tribeca Aesthetics, founded by Dr. Sung, specializes in advanced skincare treatments, with a particular focus on the nuances of Asian skin. They offer a range of energy-based treatments, including IPL, Ultherapy, Thermage, and PicoSure Pro
services: Asian-owned IPL therapy in New-York consultation

name: Union Derm
address: 860 Park Ave, New York, NY 10021 (Park Ave location) and 1065 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028 (Union Square location)
description: Union Derm features Dr. Yunyoung Claire Chang, a board-certified cosmetic dermatologist specializing in skin of color, including Asian skin. They offer state-of-the-art laser therapy, which can include IPL, to address pigmentation and other concerns common in Asian skin types

name: Dr. Dennis Gross Dermatology
description: This practice offers IPL® photofacial treatments using the Lumenis M22 laser, known for treating sun damage, hyperpigmentation, and improving skin tone. They cater to patients in New York City and surrounding areas

name: Khrom Dermatology and Aesthetics
address: 2797 Ocean Pkwy, Brooklyn, NY 11235 (and other locations)
description: Khrom Dermatology offers innovative IPL therapy, which can be precisely tuned for various skin types. They treat conditions like hyperpigmentation, spider veins, and rosacea, emphasizing a comfortable and effective experience

name: LING Spa
